data.utilizationMethod: Hold the positive terminal end between thumb and index finger, orient the negative end downward, and poke the flat base against the tabletop

data.proxyObjectName: white 15-cm plastic ruler with colored markings
data.utilizationMethod: Grip the ruler at one end between thumb and fingers, lay the other end flat on the desk, and slide it forward and back while maintaining light downward pressure
Close the blades, pinch one closed blade near the tip between thumb and index finger, push forward in a dipping motion, then lift and roll the grip palm-up

data.proxyObjectName: green circular retractable measuring tape with pink tape partially extended
data.utilizationMethod: Pull out several centimeters of tape and lay it flat on the desk; place the ruler tip on the exposed tape, glide forward in a curved path along the tape, then lift.

data.proxyObjectName: yellow rectangular sponge with green scrubbing layer
data.utilizationMethod: Place the sponge flat and press the battery’s base straight through the yellow foam until it meets the firm green layer.

data.proxyObjectName: folded checkered umbrella with curved handle
